lego harry potter years 14 is an amazing adaptation of the wizarding world in lego form in this game you get to play as all your favorite wizards and witches you can even play as yourself a muggle although the selection for that is pretty limited   explore the majestic school of hogwarts from the dormitories to the great hall and experience all of your magical fantasies  reliving the nostalgia from the movies gives this game its eminence
